name: The Legend Of The Quest For Rabarberpaj
name_original: The Legend Of The Quest For Rabarberpaj
description:
Legends tell of a pie so delicious god himself had it locked away in the middle of nowhere, guarded by the demons of earth, fire, water and wind, the rabarberpaj (literally just swedish for rhubarb pie). One day a young hero enters the mountains. His mission: To eat that pie.

The Legend Of The Quest For Rabarberpaj is a short legend of Zelda clone with dungeons, shops, bombable walls and everything.

Arrow keys to move
Z attacks and closes text boxes
X interacts with things
C plants bombs
